## Rectangle interface

Contains the position and size of a rectangle on the screen.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Rectangle extends SimplePosition 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [SimplePosition](./vm-providers.simpleposition.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./vm-providers.rectangle.height.md) | number | Height (in pixels) of the rectangle. |
|  [width](./vm-providers.rectangle.width.md) | number | Width (in pixels) of the rectangle. |
